members.name: getPrimePLength
members.comment: Returns the desired length of the prime P of the to-be-generated DSA domain parameters in bits.

return: the length of the prime P.

members.name: getSubprimeQLength
members.comment: Returns the desired length of the sub-prime Q of the to-be-generated DSA domain parameters in bits.

return: the length of the sub-prime Q.

members.name: getSeedLength
members.comment: Returns the desired length of the domain parameter seed in bits.

return: the length of the domain parameter seed.

members.comment: Creates a domain parameter specification for DSA parameter generation using primePLen and subprimeQLen. The value of subprimeQLen is also used as the default length of the domain parameter seed in bits.

param: primePLen - the desired length of the prime P in bits.
subprimeQLen - the desired length of the sub-prime Q in bits.
throws: IllegalArgumentException - if primePLen or subprimeQLen is illegal per the specification of FIPS 186-3.

members.comment: Creates a domain parameter specification for DSA parameter generation using primePLen, subprimeQLen, and seedLen.

param: primePLen - the desired length of the prime P in bits.
subprimeQLen - the desired length of the sub-prime Q in bits.
seedLen - the desired length of the domain parameter seed in bits, shall be equal to or greater than subprimeQLen.
throws: IllegalArgumentException - if primePLenLen, subprimeQLen, or seedLen is illegal per the specification of FIPS 186-3.

name: java.security.spec.DSAGenParameterSpec
comment: This immutable class specifies the set of parameters used for generating DSA parameters as specified in FIPS 186-3 Digital Signature Standard (DSS).
